author: Daniel Greene
description:
This week in Fantasy News: we break down the staggering updated sales numbers for Brandon Sanderson and Sarah J. Maas, Audible updates, and fresh book announcements like These Shattered Spires, Null Entity, The Infinite State, and While We Bleed.

Plus: a tough update for Berserk fans, NPR’s most influential high school books, and a wild mod that ports Morrowind into Elden Ring. We also cover Planescape: Torment’s first ever unofficial DLC, rumors of a new PSP, Shudder’s V/H/S Halloween, Focus Features’ Bugonia, MGM’s new Robin Hood (But Will He Wear Tights?), and the theatrical return of PEAK.

Finally, we’ve got K-Pop Demon Hunters 2 confirmed, and a massive Anthropic copyright lawsuit settlement shaking up the AI world.

title: Sanderson & Maas Sale Explode! Authors Win BIG! New PSP? || FN
